title: A 20-cent 'wonder drug' is being studied as a colon-cancer-fighting supplement, and it looks promising
author: Hilary Brueck
description: Metformin is a go-to diabetes drug, and researchers are looking at whether it can be used as a cancer-fighting supplement, too.
tags: colon-cancer, cancer prevention, generic drug, diabetes drug, wonder drug, Holli Loomans-Kropp, cancer treatment, cancer, Metformin, Loomans-Kropp, Business Insider
cntitle: 一种20美分的“神奇药物”正在被研究作为一种对抗结肠癌的补充剂，而且看起来很有希望。
cndescription: 二甲双胍是一种常用的糖尿病药物，研究人员正在研究它是否也可以用作抗癌补充剂。
